org.apache.paimon.hash

Class BytesMap<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.paimon.hash.BytesMap<K,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - type of the map key.
    V - type of the map value.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BytesHashMap

    public abstract class BytesMap<K,V>
extends Object
    Base class for BytesHashMap.

      • lookup

        public BytesMap.LookupInfo<K,V> lookup(K key)
        Parameters:
        key - by which looking up the value in the hash map. Only support the key in the BinaryRowData form who has only one MemorySegment.
        Returns:
        BytesMap.LookupInfo
